name: great hall
desc: You are standing in the great hall of Racumens Lair. There is a random gnome in the east corner of the room. Talk to him perhaps?

items.name: lantern
items.desc: illuminates your paths around the lair

npc.name: gnome
talk: Hey Traveler, watch your steps. Chaos is abound.
Argh, please don't hurt me. I am just a poor orphan gnome who cleans for copper.
Why are you here? I have nothing for you.

name: dining chamber
desc: There are dirty plates everywhere, be careful soldier. (Here we battle for an item)

npc.name: orc
talk: I hope you have said your prayers because you meet with your ancestors today
npc.win: You've been killed. The Orc now does a dance on your mutilated body. GAME OVER!!!
npc.defeat: You have defeated the Orc and a key has morphed into the room. You need this to get into the crypt

name: crypt
desc: Locked room. You need a key to get in. Perhaps you collected one in your deadly defeat of the orc in the dining chamber. Beware of traps.

npc.name: troll
talk: You will not escape this place
Bang bang bang! See you in the next life
npc.win: You lost to the troll. Better luck next time Traveler. GAME OVER!!!
npc.defeat: Victory!!! The troll has been defeated. An anti shield appears in the room. This will assist in your battle with Racumen.

name: torture chamber
desc: the torture chamber. be careful soldier,danger lurks ahead

npc.name: racumen
talk: You can not defeat me, I have an impregnable shield
You can not defeat me, I have an impregnable shield
You can not defeat me, I have an impregnable shield
npc.win: You lost! Racumen killed you and you have failed to reverse the curse. GAME OVER!!!!!!
npc.defeat: YOU WIN!!! Racumen has been defeated and the curse reversed. Your generation thanks you Idryssa. GAME OVER!!!!!!

name: ancient study
desc: Ancient study. Library of all the great books in the world, with a familiar character inside

npc.name: elon
talk: I kinda love Etsy, but don't mind me, you need to kill a warlock
If life is a video game, the graphics are great but the plot is confusing and the tutorial is way too long. This has nothing to do with your quest traveler, i just don't get guests often
